aspguidp.service.data.manager

Interface EntityDataManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AtomConsumer, AtomSupplier, DataManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleEntityDataManager

    public interface EntityDataManager
extends DataManager
    Interface for an entity data manager.

    An entity data manager is responsible for managing a set of Entity instances. This is used by the entity input and entity output components of the application to store and access the entities which are inputted by the user or outputted to the user (EntityInputController, EntityInputController).

    • Method Detail

      • addByUserInput

        boolean addByUserInput(java.lang.String displayRepresentation)
        Add an entity to the entities of the manager by the display representation of the entity. This method is called when an entity input component tries to store the user input to the entity data manager.
        Parameters:
        displayRepresentation - display representation of the entity which is added to the entities of the manager
        Returns:
        true, if the display representation was successfully converted to an entity and added to the entities of the manager

      • clear

        void clear()
        Remove all managed entities from the manager instance.

      • getEntities

        javafx.collections.ObservableList<Entity> getEntities()
        Returns:
        observable list which contains the entities which are managed by the manager instance.
